Title.evidence: Adherence to lung-protective ventilation leads to a lower incidence of perioperative pulmonary complications.

Intervention.evidence: SOP enhanced with a mandatory educational programme

Objective.evidence: to assess the impact of a standardized operating procedure (SOP) enhanced with a mandatory educational programme on adherence to intraoperative lung protective ventilation (IOLPV).

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 164 patients were enrolled (Group A 82, Group B 82) in the study.

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 164 patients were enrolled (Group A 82, Group B 82) in the study.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The number of procedures with adherence to the whole IOLPV bundle was significantly greater in Group B (Group A, 4%; Group B, 24%; p < 0.001).

Trial_Registration.evidence: The study has been preregistered in registry clinicaltrials.gov and assigned the study registration number NCT05831683
